title: Lasko R12210 Classic Metal Table Fan
description:
The Lasko 12in Classic Table Fan marries vintage charm with modern performance. The all-metal design in oil-rubbed bronze finish includes a mid-century inspired Lasko nameplate.

Classic style. Refreshing comfort. 

From the brand you can trust...Lasko.

asset.author: Lasko Products
asset.description:
The Lasko 12in Classic Table Fan marries vintage charm with modern performance. The all-metal design in oil-rubbed bronze finish includes a mid-century inspired Lasko nameplate.

Classic style. Refreshing comfort. 

From the brand you can trust...Lasko.

transcripts: Cool down with the Lasko classic fan, this classic design meets modern performance and quality craftsmanship. The 12 inch metal table fan features an oil rub bronze finish and all metal construction for a sleek look. With 3 quiet speeds, wide isolation and a carry handle, this fan is easy to transport and even easier to use. Arriving fully assembled and including a patent fused safety plug. Lasko classic fan is sure to guarantee comfort in your home.
